entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Halifax Stanfield Int'l Airport 03:29 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 6.6°C
Wind: ESE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 7:08 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. Temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog dissipating near noon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:08 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
